text: By including the Diameter Stack agent in a workflow you enable MediationZone to act as a Diameter server for any application that follows the Diameter Base Protocol (RFC 6733). For further information about the agent's operation, see the section, Diameter S tac k in The Diameter Base Protocol . The section contains the following subsections: Diameter Stack Agent Configuration Diameter Stack Agent Events Diameter Stack Agent Input/Output Data and MIM
title: Diameter Stack Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
